title: The Shining
content: A terrifying psychological horror story about a haunted hotel in the mountains. Jack Torrance descends into madness while isolated with his family during winter.
author: Stephen King

title: It
content: A frightening tale of a shape-shifting evil entity that terrorizes children in a small town. Pennywise the clown haunts the sewers of Derry.
author: Stephen King

title: The Exorcist
content: A spine-chilling story of demonic possession. A young girl becomes possessed by a malevolent demon, and priests must perform an exorcism.
author: William Peter Blatty

title: Gone Girl
content: A gripping psychological thriller about a wife who disappears on her anniversary. Dark secrets and twisted minds make this a suspenseful page-turner.
author: Gillian Flynn

title: Pride and Prejudice
content: A beloved romantic novel about Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy. Their love story overcomes pride, prejudice, and social class differences in Regency England.
author: Jane Austen

title: Dune
content: An epic science fiction masterpiece set on the desert planet Arrakis. Political intrigue, giant sandworms, and spice melange shape the universe.
author: Frank Herbert

title: The Martian
content: A survival story about an astronaut stranded alone on Mars. Using science and ingenuity, Mark Watney must find a way to survive and signal Earth.
author: Andy Weir

title: The Hobbit
content: A magical adventure story about Bilbo Baggins who joins dwarves on a quest to reclaim their homeland from a dragon. Trolls, elves, and goblins await.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

title: The Da Vinci Code
content: A mystery thriller involving secret societies, religious symbology, and a quest to uncover ancient secrets hidden in Leonardo da Vinci's works.
author: Dan Brown

title: Dracula
content: The classic vampire horror novel. Count Dracula travels from Transylvania to England, spreading terror and creating an undead army.
author: Bram Stoker
